name: Crazy Traveler
description: A figure appears on the long road ahead. As you grow closer you notice the figure is a man in ragged clothes who appears to be yelling at a tree. As you approach, the man turns and, with wide eyes yells: "Ones and zeroes! JavaScript! It's all a game!"

name: The Lost
description: You come across a small group of people who appear to be lost. They ask if you know the way to the nearest town. They seem to be in a hurry and are very nervous.

name: The Bandit
description: A figure appears on the long road ahead. As you grow closer you notice the figure. It's a bandit! He's armed and dangerous. He demands you hand over all your gold.

name: The Merchant
description: A figure appears on the long road ahead. As you grow closer you notice the figure. It's a merchant! He's selling all sorts of goods. He offers to sell you some of his wares.

name: The Caravan
description: A figure appears on the long road ahead. As you grow closer you notice the figure. It's a caravan! They are traveling to the nearest town and offer to let you join them.
